name: B. Football Kit
statement:
Consider a football tournament where teams participate. Each team has
two football kits: for home games, and for away games. The kit for home
games of the -th team has color and the kit for away games of this team
has color .In the tournament, each team plays exactly one home game and
exactly one away game with each other team ( games in total). The team,
that plays the home game, traditionally plays in its home kit. The team
that plays an away game plays in its away kit. However, if two teams has
the kits of the same color, they cannot be distinguished. In this case
the away team plays in its home kit.Calculate how many games in the
described tournament each team plays in its home kit and how many games
it plays in its away kit.
